original_text: He was the king who built Elath into a strong city again. He put it back under Judah's power. He did that after his father Amaziah had died.
korean_text: 아마샤가 그의 조상들과 함께 잔 후에 아사랴가 엘랏을 건축하여 유다에 복귀시켰더라

sentences.original_text: who built Elath into a strong city again
He put it back under Judah's power
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그것을 유다의 통치하에 되돌려 놓았다

sentences.original_text: after his father Amaziah had died
